title: The Dragon and the “Princess” - Novel Updates
tags: Bestiality   Clingy Lover   Cross-dressing   Cute Story   Dragons   Fantasy World   Heartwarming   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Mpreg   Royalty   Short Story
author: Some Wailing   某嗷
description:
The story of a little prince who pretended to be a princess for some unknown reason and the dragon who’s had his eyes on him for a very long time now. 

--

With my love for you, I crossed the sea, flew across the starry sky through miles of earth so I could finally catch your eye and meld our hearts into one.>
